title: AVAPOW Car Jump Starter, 4000A Peak 27800mAh Battery Jump Starter (for All Gas or Up to 10L Diesel), Battery Booster Power Pack, 12V Auto Jump Box with LED Light, USB Quick Charge 3.0, 4000A peak current, includes 88Wh portable battery charger
descriptions:
AVAPOW Car Jump Starter, 4000A Peak, 27800mAh (88Wh) Portable 12V Jump Box with USB QC 3.0, Type-C In/Out, LED Flashlight/SOS/Strobe, Intelligent Protection, for Gas Engines (All) and Diesel up to 10L

Key Features:
- Powerful 4000A jump start: Safely jump-start 12V vehicles including cars, trucks, motorcycles, ATVs/UTVs, lawn mowers, and snowmobiles. Supports all gasoline engines and diesel engines up to 10L. Up to 40 starts on a full charge.
- High-capacity 27800mAh (88Wh) power bank: Keep devices powered on the go. Delivers up to 75% faster charging than ordinary power banks.
- Fast charging options: 
  - USB Quick Charge 3.0 Port: 5V/3A, 9V/2A, 12V/1.5A.
  - USB 5V/2.4A Port for standard fast charging.
  - Type-C bidirectional port: Input/Output for flexible charging and recharging.
- Intelligent safety protections: Built-in systems guard against short circuit, low battery, high temperature, and reverse connection. Includes rugged design with sturdy metal clamps for reliable, safe operation.
- Emergency LED light: Three modes—flashlight, SOS, and strobe—for nighttime use and roadside emergencies.
- Portable and travel-ready: Compact jump box with a durable carry case to keep everything organized in your trunk or toolbox.

What’s in the Box:
- Portable Battery Starter (AVAPOW Car Jump Starter)
- Heavy-duty Jumper Cables with metal clamps
- USB-C Cable
- Cigarette Lighter Converter
- Carry Case
- User Manual

Additional Details:
- Battery booster type: 12V auto jump box
- Suitable for: 12V cars, motorcycles, ATVs, UTVs, lawn mowers, snowmobiles
- Adapter included: No (recharge via existing USB charger or Type-C)
- Support: 24-hour online after-sales team

Why Choose AVAPOW:
Get dependable jump-start power when you need it most, plus fast charging for your devices. With robust safety tech, rugged construction, and emergency lighting, this 4000A jump starter is your all-in-one roadside companion.
